snippet.title: O2Jam Battle Vol.2 Play Movie -1 : 1vs1 MultiPlay
snippet.description:
Introducing O2Jam Battle Vol.2

A new installment of the music game brand O2Jam, started the first service in 2001, with the world's largest 800+ original sound sources.

= O2Jam Battle Vol.1 : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.o2jam.battle
= O2Jam Battle Vol.2 : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.o2jam.battle.vol2
= O2Jam Battle Vol.3 : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.o2jam.battle.vol3
= O2Jam Battle Vol.4 : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.o2jam.battle.vol4
= O2Jam Battle Vol.5 : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.o2jam.battle.vol5
= O2Jam Battle Vol.6 : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.o2jam.battle.vol6
= O2Jam Battle Vol.7 : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.o2jam.battle.vol7
= O2Jam Battle Vol.8 : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.o2jam.battle.vol8

▣ “Matchup” based Rhythm Game 
Being an expert player in music game is definitely a thing to show off, however, due to the nature of mobile and that of music game, it was really hard for both the players and developers to present. 
Thus, O2Jam Battle is solely focused on “Matchup” and “Battle.” Also, on the smart devices with good specifications, users can enjoy their audienceships by watching the performances of other players. 
The audience mode can be off when users just want to enjoy their own playing.   

▣ Totally Free Songs
There is no in-app purchase for O2Jam Battle at all. All songs for stages are entirely free and made for O2Jam brand, and the songs can be completed by users playing them. 
If you’re having fun with O2Jam Battle, just watch the advertisements in between stages. 

▣ World’s Best Recital Halls Tour
For the best result in Matchup according to the player’s skill level, O2Jam Battle’s leagues are named after the world’s best recital halls, and each hall has unique fun to perform. 
In order to stimulate the desire of winning and achievement, performance fee is required for a hall play.

▣ This is a beginning
O2Jam Battle limited 25 songs to play because for the best gaming experience such as convenience in downloading, storage usage on the device and stability of the service. 
And the next installments of the series will offer additional 25 songs respectively. So this is not an ending but a beginning, in order for better next version, please feel free to share great ideas of yours.

If you have any concerns or opinions to share, please email to nexstudioapp@gmail.com
